message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR 

This paper is about generating natural language descriptions of images, which involves both computer vision and natural language processing. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also uses a deep recurrent architecture, which is a common technique in natural language processing, suggesting that it could also belong to cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper uses machine learning to train the model, which could fall under cs.LG (Machine Learning). The task of generating image descriptions is also related to artificial intelligence, which could place it in cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper discusses a competition and the various improvements made to the model, which could be relevant to information retrieval, making cs.IR (Information Retrieval) a possible category as well.
